Allows selection of parents from population.

Method Detail

init

void init(java.util.List<Chromosome> population)
Prepares Selection for new generation.

This method is called just before first selection on every new generation.

Parameters:
population - whole population

select

Chromosome select()
Selects one parent from current population (set in init(java.util.List)).

Returns:
selected parent
